Tale features

  • Compatible with GitHub Pages
  • Responsive design (looks just as good on mobile)
  • Syntax highlighting, with the help of Pygments
  • Markdown and HTML text formatting
  • Pagination of posts

Head over to the Example Content post for a showcase of Taleâ€™s text formatting features.

Browser Support

Tale works on most if not all modern browsers, including Chrome, Safari and Firefox ğŸ‘ğŸ¼

Download or Contribute

Tale is publicly hosted on GitHub, so go ahead and download or fork it at the GitHub repository. If you spot any bugs or have any suggestions, feel free to create an issue or make a pull request.

Thanks for checking out Tale!
